Class GenericTextProcessingStrategy

java.lang.Object
  asta.model.GenericTextProcessingStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITextProcessingStrategy
public class GenericTextProcessingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITextProcessingStrategy

the generic text processing strategy that evaluates plain text and informs about words found within it

Author:
andreas.gerlach
